result.title: How to solve this DP problem?
result.content:
I was trying to solve this problem early on a practice contest but couldn't make it. I want to know if someone can explain me how to code the solution or at least what is the correct approach. I think is dynamic programming but I don't know how to code it.

The problem statement says: "Given an integer N, in how many ways you can tile a 4 x N rectangle with 3 x 1 tiles? Because the answer can be large, we are interested in the remainder after answer is divided by 1,000,000,007."

It appears like the how many ways can you get a set of elements to sum an especifict number problem, but Im failing on seeing the relations.

Thanks!
